short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download high-quality images and videos from Etsy listings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Etsy Media Downloader Pro is a powerful Chrome extension that allows you to easily download high-quality images and videos from Etsy listings. Whether you're an Etsy seller looking to save product photos for inspiration, a buyer wanting to keep images of items you love, or just someone who appreciates Etsy's beautiful visuals, this extension simplifies the process of saving media from Etsy pages.

Key features:
- Download the main product image in the highest available quality
- Save all images from a listing in one click
- Download product videos when available
- Automatic renaming of files based on listing title and timestamp
- Robust error handling and retry mechanism for reliable downloads

This extension is perfect for:
- Etsy sellers researching product photography ideas
- Buyers creating mood boards or wishlists
- Designers and artists looking for inspiration
- Anyone who wants an easy way to save Etsy's high-quality product media

Etsy Media Downloader Pro respects Etsy's structure and doesn't interfere with the site's functionality. It simply adds a convenient way to save the media that Etsy already makes publicly available on their listing pages.

Install Etsy Media Downloader Pro today to streamline your Etsy browsing experience and never lose track of inspiring product images or videos again!
